title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Cyber Risk is Business Risk: Managing Cloud Security Without Disruption(SEC212)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 网络风险即业务风险：无中断管理云安全(SEC212)
abstract: RiskSpan is transforming private credit markets through innovative platform powered by AWS Generative AI and Bedrock. Riskspan's GenAI powered tool automatically models financial transactions directly from documents, extracting and processing critical data to generate precise valuation and risk metrics. This comprehensive approach not only standardizes procedures but also significantly enhances risk management capabilities across portfolios. Join us to explore how Riskspan's solution, powered by AWS GenAI and Bedrock, is driving the critical needs for transparency and accessibility in a $14 trillion market with $9 trillion growth potential from underrepresented regions.
abstract_cn: RiskSpan正在通过由AWS生成式AI和Bedrock驱动的创新平台改变私募信贷市场。RiskSpan的生成式AI工具可直接从文档自动建模金融交易，提取和处理关键数据以生成精确的估值和风险指标。这种综合方法不仅标准化了流程，还显著增强了投资组合的风险管理能力。加入我们，探索RiskSpan的解决方案如何通过AWS生成式AI和Bedrock驱动，满足这个价值14万亿美元市场的透明度和可访问性关键需求，该市场在代表性不足的地区拥有9万亿美元的增长潜力。
